DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1 , combine Single Ascending Dose ( SAD ) Multiple-ascending Dose ( MAD ) study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , pharmacodynamics ( PD ) MEDI4166 Subjects Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2D ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Single- Multiple Dose Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics MEDI4166 Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This study first time human ( FTIH ) , Phase 1 , randomize , double-blind study evaluate safety , tolerability , PK , PD MEDI4166 administer single multiple ascend dos subject T2D .
